title: Shape of Post-Pandemic Scientific Conferences
description: The COVID-19 pandemic drastically changed several aspects of our lives, including how we experience academic conferences. Several scientific venues were converted to online-only or hybrid events, providing opportunities to try new ways to organize such events and go beyond the classical conference structure. As society slowly moves back to normalcy, shaping and running events is still challenging for conference organizers, given the uncertain pandemic. While there is a general preference for in-person events, the past two years demonstrated the potential of digital technologies in offering hybrid experiences benefiting organizers and attendees alike.
